document.discussion_title: Liberum Capital Reiterates Buy Rating for Gresham House plc (GHE)
document.topic_text: Tweet Liberum Capital reissued their buy rating on shares of Gresham House plc (LON:GHE) in a report published on Tuesday. The brokerage currently has a GBX 381 ($4.91) price target on the stock. Shares of Gresham House plc ( LON:GHE ) opened at 335.00 on Tuesday. The firm has a 50-day moving average of GBX 306.27 and a 200-day moving average of GBX 317.41. Gresham House plc has a one year low of GBX 3.04 and a one year high of GBX 370.00. The firm’s market capitalization is GBX 31.71 million. Separately, FinnCap reaffirmed a corporate rating and issued a GBX 1,000 ($12.88) target price on shares of Gresham House plc in a research report on Thursday, June 23rd. Gresham House PLC is a United Kingdom-based asset management company. The Company focuses on making investments in smaller public and private companies with the objective of delivering investors superior risk adjusted returns. Gresham House plc Gresham House plc
